vlive.korean: 아까워서? 아까워서 맞아요? I spared it. Spare... Right? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 해피댕댕데이🐶🎂🎉
아까워서 아직... - 아직? I haven't used it until now. - Until now? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 해피댕댕데이🐶🎂🎉
vlive.english: I haven't used it until now. - Until now?

vlive.korean: 아까워서 먹어야겠어 - 앞으로 먹방 하지말자 - 진짜... I think I need to eat this up. - shouldn't do mukbang going forward. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 귀여워?🙆‍♂️ 깜찍해?🙆‍♂️ 정답!! 우뿌즈 치킨먹방🍗(feat.망했어...) (BEOMGYU&TAEHYUN playing twenty questions)
vlive.english: I think I need to eat this up. - shouldn't do mukbang going forward.

vlive.korean: 저는 그거 아까워서 - 아깝나요? 써도 될 것 같은데요 - 표절 안 되나요? I was sad to see that being forgotten. - Were you? - Can we copy another song? 듣기 View video X1 : [X1 RADIO] '원잇을 꿈꾸는 날에' EP.1 - 프롤로그
vlive.english: I was sad to see that being forgotten. - Were you? - Can we copy another song?

vlive.korean: [청천벽력] 이거 아까워서 어떻게 들어! [Sad news] How can I hear this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [YOON JISUNG] 윤지룽 다른 사람 앞에서 귀엽지 마... (JISUNG introducing his goods)
vlive.english: [Sad news] How can I hear this?

examples.korean: Not worth the hard drive space, deleting most of this album and only keeping 2 songs. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 하드 드라이브 공간이 아까워서 다 삭제하고 딱 2곡만 남겨뒀어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Not worth the hard drive space, deleting most of this album and only keeping 2 songs. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We couldn't afford to miss the exposure. Our writer wasn't that happy, but we accepted the revisions and here we are. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 워낙 좋은 조건이라 놓치기 아까워서 작가의 불평도 무릅쓰고 이렇게까지 수정을 한 거요. hansemEUG
examples.english: We couldn't afford to miss the exposure. Our writer wasn't that happy, but we accepted the revisions and here we are. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Our team came a close second. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리 팀이 아깝게[1위와 거의 차이가 안 나는] 2위를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our team came a close second. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was pipped at/to the post for the top award. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 1등상을 근소한 차이로[아깝게] 빼앗겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was pipped at/to the post for the top award. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I begrudge every second I spent trying to help him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 그를 도와주려고 쏟은 일분일초가 아까워. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
